name: 3D Motocross: Industrial
description:
3D Motocross: Industrial is a motorbike game set in an Industrial zone. Each level has been packed with fun obstacle courses for you to drive your motorbike over. Use your skills to become the ultimate motocross bike rider to overcome the vast amount of obstacles set in the 20 amazing levels. Some of the levels require skill.. then others may require some dangerous motocross jumps!

You think you can complete the levels without dying - I think not! Or, do you think you are up to the challenge?

- 20 Fantastic levels!
- 3D Graphics throughout!
- Amazing Physics!
- Amazing Obstacles and Levels

Great 3D Motorcross fun!
